title: Check out Google Play Books’ list of the best books of the year so far.
description: The Google Play Books team released a curated list of the books they read and loved so far this year. From thrilling fantasy epics to thought-provoking nonfiction to bon…
excerpt: The Google Play Books team released a curated list of the books they read and loved so far this year. From thrilling fantasy epics to thought-provoking nonfiction to bone-chilling horror, they’ve got picks for every reader (even kids!). Browse the collection in the Google Play Books store and in the Play Books app on Android and iOS. Discover the books that the team couldn’t put down, and find your next great read today.
